TECHNICAL_SECTION.FORM_LG_LIST: DA DE EN ES FI FR EL IT NL PT SV CS ET HU LT LV MT PL SK SL GA BG RO HR

NOTICE_DATA.n2016:PERFORMANCE_NUTS: Outer London – East and North East

CONTENTS.P: An OJEU amendment has been issued by CGT to provide clarity on scope and value of requirements to be let against this OJEU Restricted Procurement. CGT wish to add to the scope of the original OJEU notice the option of appointing via the successful Main contractor for Phase 2 works further spot awards (at CGT sole and absolute discretion) for the future phase 3 works subject to satisfactory completion of Phase 2 scope delivery. The Original Phase 2 Value was for a range of 12 000 000 — 14 000 000 GBP. For Phase 3 works any appointed value is not expected to exceed up to a further 20 000 000 GBP. Please note CGT reserve the right to appoint relevant sub supply chain partners also at its sole and absolute discretion.

Please note CGT reserve the right to appoint relevant sub supply chain partners also at its sole and absolute discretion.

P.FT: (Supplement to the Official Journal of the European Union, 17.10.2017, 2017/S 199-410337)

CONTENTS.P: Текст, който трябва да се добави:

An OJEU amendment has been issued by CGT to provide clarity on scope and value of requirements to be let against this OJEU Restricted Procurement. CGT wish to add to the scope of the original OJEU notice the option of appointing via the successful Main contractor for Phase 2 works further spot awards (at CGT sole and absolute discretion) for the future phase 3 works subject to satisfactory completion of Phase 2 scope delivery. The Original Phase 2 Value was for a range of 12 000 000 — 14 000 000 GBP. For Phase 3 works any appointed value is not expected to exceed up to a further 20 000 000 GBP. Please note CGT reserve the right to appoint relevant sub supply chain partners also at its sole and absolute discretion.
